document.full_text: two men have been arrested in canada and charged with the 1988 murders of two new hampshire women, decades after earlier cases against the pair ended with multiple mistrials or were dropped, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: two men re-arrested in 1988 murders of new hampshire women
lines_and_colors: two men have been arrested in canada and charged with the 1988 murders of two new hampshire women, decades after earlier cases against the pair ended with multiple mistrials or were dropped, authorities said on tuesday.
